name: RedBrick AI
headline: Rapid medical data annotation
description:
RedBrick AI's mission is to accelerate the adoption of artificial intelligence in radiology by building world-class software infrastructure. Currently, we are focused on helping radiology AI teams prepare high-quality datasets to train their algorithms.

Radiology data, such as CT and X-ray scans, is an incredibly important source of truth in healthcare delivery. In fact, over 90% of all healthcare data is medical imagery! However, the global radiology workforce is overburdened. In the UK, for example, only 2% of radiology departments are able to fulfill their reporting requirements, and this trend is reflected worldwide.

The acute state of radiology, coupled with the abundance of data, makes the use of AI in radiology a prime candidate. In 2022, $5.6 billion was invested in the development of AI in healthcare! However, a key hindrance to further adoption is the lack of sophisticated tools to build and deploy AI algorithms in clinical environments. This is the problem we’re focused on at RedBrick AI

We're a team based out of Bangalore India, and USA. We're backed by leading institutional investors like Y Combinator and Peak XV (formerly Sequoia Capital India).

founders.name: Shivam Sharma, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CEO of RedBrick AI with a background in Aerospace Engineering and Computer Science. After building tooling to help accelerate creation of high quality datasets for research purposes, Shivam & Derek co-founded RedBrick AI to address the challenge of creating high quality annotated medical datasets. 

Previously worked on Hyperloop technology, conducted research in collision avoidance deep neural networks and novel propulsion techniques for small satellites.

founders.name: Derek Lukacs, Founder
founders.description:
Derek Lukacs is the cofounder and CTO of RedBrick AI and currently spends his time leading the team on improving the RedBrick AI product capabilities and user experience.

He holds a Bachelors and Masters in Aerospace Engineering from the University of Michigan where he cofounded the SpaceX Hyperloop pod competition team alongside current Cofounder Shivam Sharma.

### Feel the speed
## 5x faster than manual annotation
### Nothing like you've ever used before.
![thumbnail](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fannotate-thumbnail.d3a27e16.webp&w=3840&q=75)![thumbnail](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fannotate-thumbnail.d3a27e16.webp&w=3840&q=75)![thumbnail](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fannotate-thumbnail.d3a27e16.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Pixel-perfect annotations
Region growing, thresholding, island removal, Boolean operations, and more.
Faster segmentation with A.I.
Use our Fast Automated Segmentation Tool powered by Meta AI's SAM.
Ergonomic 3D contouring
Use our contouring tool for 2D annotations and edits, and 3D interpolation.
![](https://redbrickai.com/icons-2/arrow-left.svg)![](https://redbrickai.com/icons-2/arrow-right.svg)
![](https://redbrickai.com/customer-logos-color-2/Olea.svg)
"Our process has improved significantly, and our overall annotation loop is much faster thanks to a platform that helps you with the entire annotation cycle."
Jean-François Weissman
Cloud Solutions Architect 
[Case Study ![](https://redbrickai.com/icons-2/chevron.svg)](https://redbrickai.com/<https:/blog.redbrickai.com/blog-posts/olea-medical-improved-diagnosis-for-life>)
### Feel the magic
## The best viewing experience for DICOM
### Medical images and data accessible from anywhere, all on your browser.
A real 3D viewing experience
All the viewing features you need, including MIP, oblique planes, and photorealistic rendering.
Rapid loading, even for large 3D studies
Data is intelligently cached and loaded lazily for a quick, first interaction.
![](https://redbrickai.com/icons-2/arrow-left.svg)![](https://redbrickai.com/icons-2/arrow-right.svg)
![](https://redbrickai.com/customer-logos-color-2/RapidAI.svg)
"Segmentation tools like that of RedBrick AI are not found in any other cloud software."
Dr. James Ryan Mason
Neuroradiology Consultant 
[Case Study ![](https://redbrickai.com/icons-2/chevron.svg)](https://redbrickai.com/<https:/blog.redbrickai.com/blog-posts/redefining-neurovascular-and-vascular-care---rapidai-redbrick-ai>)
### Make it yours
## Adaptable to your personal workflow
### Free yourself from any limitations on how you work.
The most user-friendly annotation tool you’ll ever see
Become a power-user with shortcuts and customizations.
![shortcuts](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fkeyboard.11b0da50.png&w=3840&q=75)
Native support for medical imagery
Your favorite formats available out of the box.
![dataformats](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdataformats.2d92dad9.png&w=3840&q=75)![dataformats](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdataformats--small.0da64367.png&w=3840&q=75)
A viewer personalized for you
Fully customizable layouts with automatic hanging protocols.
![personal viewer](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpersonalized-viewer.8d296d56.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://redbrickai.com/customer-logos-color-2/Qure.svg)
"All of our processes and workflows improved due to RedBrick AI."
Ritvik Jain
Product Manager
[Case Study ![](https://redbrickai.com/icons-2/chevron.svg)](https://redbrickai.com/<https:/blog.redbrickai.com/blog-posts/accessible-affordable-healthcare-using-ai-qure-ai-redbrick-ai>)
### Seek perfection
## Collaborate to create pixel-perfect annotations
### Building high quality training datasets is a collective effort.
Build a reliable process
Use quality control workflows with multi-step review and consensus.
![reliable process](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Freliable-process.d85d34ae.png&w=3840&q=75)
Collaborate with 2 or 200 annotators
Seamless user management, task assignment, and infinite scalability.
![collaborate](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcollaborate.dcf939ce.png&w=3840&q=75)
Find annotation errors in real-time
Enforce quality standards with custom validation checks run in the browser.
![errors](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ferrors.4b4d68e8.png&w=3840&q=75)
Select a high quality and balanced dataset
Deep search and filtering, overview statistics of DICOM tags, and metadata analytics.
![balanced](https://redbrickai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbalanced.1abc83db.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://redbrickai.com/customer-logos-color-2/annalise.svg)
“RedBrick AI is really integral to how we develop AI at Annalise. It allows us to label all of our data in a comprehensive and efficient manner.”
Jarrel Seah
Associate Director of Clinical AI
### Be in full control
## Built for AI development in compliant environments
### Retain total ownership of your patient and annotation data while being fully compliant.
![](https://redbrickai.com/index/cloud.png)
Control your annotation process with APIs
Import, export, assign, search, and much more through our SDK and CLI.
![](https://redbrickai.com/index/compliance.png)
Your data stays safe with you, in your hands
Integrate your own storage or a third-party provider.
![](https://redbrickai.com/index/fda.png)
Used for FDA and CE clinical validation studies
Full audit trails of workflows and support for clinical validation workflows.
![](https://redbrickai.com/customer-logos-color-2/Cerebriu-dark.svg)
“RedBrick AI literally combines the best of both worlds, the technicality of a traditional annotation software and the user experience of clinical radiology viewers.”
Dr. Amine Korchi
Chief Medical Officer
![](https://redbrickai.com/index/shiny-logo.png)

generated_description:
**RedBrick AI: Revolutionizing Radiology Data Annotation**

**Overview**
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, RedBrick AI is on a mission to transform the landscape of radiology by accelerating the adoption of artificial intelligence through high-quality medical data annotation. The company is based in Claymont, Delaware, with a talented team of 13 and additional operations in Bangalore, India. With backing from prominent investors like Y Combinator and Peak XV (formerly Sequoia Capital India), RedBrick AI is primed to tackle a critical issue in healthcare.

**The Problem**
Medical imaging—think CT and X-ray scans—represents over 90% of healthcare data and is crucial for effective medical delivery. However, the growing demand placed on radiology departments around the world has led to a workforce stretched too thin. For instance, in the UK, only 2% of radiology departments can meet their reporting needs, a scenario mirrored globally. This increasing data and demand create an ideal environment for AI intervention, but the challenge remains: there are not enough sophisticated tools to develop and implement AI algorithms effectively.

**What They Do**
RedBrick AI offers a state-of-the-art platform designed to make the process of data annotation faster and more accurate—up to **five times faster** than traditional methods. Their array of services includes:
- **Pixel-perfect annotations**: Tools for tasks like region growing and Boolean operations ensure high-quality data is at hand.
- **Automated segmentation and contouring tools**: Innovations powered by AI assist in precise, ergonomic markings that cater to 2D and 3D annotations.
- **A user-friendly interface**: Customization and shortcuts make it easy for users to adopt their workflows to fit personal needs.

RedBrick AI pulls together these sophisticated features into a single, accessible platform that allows radiologists and researchers to collaborate effectively and maintain strict standards of quality throughout the annotation process.

**Why It Matters**
The implications are profound—speeding up the annotation process not only aids in developing effective AI algorithms but also ultimately enhances patient care by facilitating faster diagnoses and treatment. The platform ensures data security with comprehensive compliance measures, keeping medical imagery safe while giving full control over data usage.

**In Summary**
If you’re looking for cutting-edge tools to handle medical data, RedBrick AI is a strong contender. With a clear mission, a skilled team, and innovative technology, they're poised to play a pivotal role in the future of radiology and AI in healthcare. Check out their website for more details: [RedBrick AI](https://redbrickai.com).
